about_the_game:
■ Three Cards, Triple Fun

- Unique tactical TCG, CCG among card games!
- If you like RPG games, you will definitely love Triple Fantasy!
Triple Fantasy is a cute pixel design, but it's a card battle game with a deep strategy.
The player plays with a total of 27 cards.
The goal is to strategically combine 3 cards to defeat the enemy.
You receive 6 cards at the start and attack with 3 cards at each turn.
In other words, the combination of the 3 cards should be used strategically.
Sometimes you need to throw away cards to win the battle.
Cards come in a total of 4 classes.
There are 'Steel' class that deals damage,
'Faith' class that heals and manages crowd control skills,
'Magic' class that deals Area of Effect skills, and the special 'Wild' class that can be used in any situation.
There are also various 'Jobs' such as Warrior, Monk, Sorcerer, etc.
There are also Water, Earth, and Fire elements.
The game is similar to the basic rules of poker such as Double, Flush, and Straight.
Tremendous damage can be given or the HP can be healed by multiplying the damage through combining each Class, Job, and Element.
There are more than 300 cards,
and you can make your own deck through the obtained resources.
Now enjoy the game with your own cards and your own strategy.

■ Free welcome-gifts for new users are awaiting!


- We are giving everyone 500 free summons!
- Complete the mission and earn the Mythic Cards!

■ A card collecting game with unique dot characters


- Sun Wukong, Thor, Odin, and characters from 'Romance of the three kingdoms?!' Meet familiar legends in the adventure!
- Collect over 300 pixel art heroes! One of the best card collecting RPG games!
- From normal heroes to legends! Collect cards in various tiers and become stronger!

■ Various contents that will never go boring


- The basis of strategy games! Expand the world with your one and only deck! [Outpost]
- Attack monsters with different elements! Rewards depending on the strategy! [Goblin Mine]
- A true strategy card game enjoyed by random cards! Thrilling turn-based PVP! [Arena]
- Collect unique dot heroes hidden somewhere in the map! [Monster Dungeon]
- Defeat various monsters with powerful card combinations! The real tactical RPG game! [Lab]
- Use tactics in the PVP as well! Fun triples in Card battle games when enjoyed together! [Devil's Ruins]
- NO Grinding! The real-time battle only with card strategy skills! [Unknown Portal]


Enjoy strategy games with cute dot heroes!
One of the best card battle RPG games! Download now!
